titleStmt.title: La picara, or, The triumphs of female subtilty display'd in the artifices and impostures of a beautiful woman, who trapann'd the most experienc'd rogues, and made all those unhappy who thought her handsome : originally a Spanish relation, enriched with three pleasant novels / render'd into English with some alterations and additions by John Davies ...
A lo que obliga el honor. English
titleStmt.author: Castillo Solórzano, Alonso de, 1584-1648?
